attributes.action: Tell the EU we support Parliament's rejection of the Withdrawal Agreement.
attributes.background: Parliament has voted 3x to reject the Brexit Withdrawal Agreement. The EU are refusing to re-open negotiations. We support the verdict of our elected representatives and see this EU intransigence as anti-democratic. The Agreement should be renegotiated to avoid a no deal Brexit.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
